name: Unpolitisch
tagline: Data driven insights in policy, economics and politics.
body:
# Unpolitisch
###Data driven insights in policy, economics and politics.

This repository constitutes what I have learned from the courses Harvard Data Science and Economics courses, MIT (edX) 'The Analytics Edge', Stanford (edX) 'Machine Learning' and Duke University (Coursera) 'Data Analysis and Statistical Inference'. This websites aims to be my platform to publish some of my own data science exercises and to publish course related work. I plan on finishing the Harvard Data Science certificate in 2016 and to focus my work on economic analyses.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
